resources.string: I see myself as a highly motivated, independently working physicist with experiences in international research, leadership and data science."\n" Over the course of my university studies I was repeatedly able to show my capabilities to get to grips with topics of cutting-edge physical research and was able to work an successfully peer-reviewed publications."\n" In the last years I additionally developed a strong interest in the automation of recurring procedures and the creation of mobile android applications, during my university years, and would like to develop myself in this direction.
